forecaster.person module¶

A module providing a Person class.

class forecaster.person.Person(initial_year, name, birth_date, retirement_date=None, gross_income=0, raise_rate=0, spouse=None, tax_treatment=None, inputs=None)[source]¶

Bases: forecaster.ledger.TaxSource

Represents a person’s basic information: age and retirement age.

name¶

str – The person’s name. No specific form is required; this is only used for display, not any computations.

birth_date¶

datetime – The person’s birth date. May be passed as an int (interpreted as the birth year) or as a datetime-convertible value (e.g. a string in a suitable format)

retirement_date¶

datetime – The person’s retirement date. Optional. May be passed as an int (interpreted as the birth year) or as a datetime-convertible value (e.g. a string in a suitable format)

gross_income¶

Money – Annual gross income for the current year.

gross_income_history¶

dict[int, Money] – Gross income for all years on record.

net_income¶

Money – Annual net income for the current year.

net_income_history¶

dict[int, Money] – Net income for all years on record.

raise_rate_function¶

callable – A function for determining the Person’s raise rate for a given year. A callable object with the form raise_rate_function(year) -> Decimal.

raise_rate¶

Decimal – The person’s raise in gross income this year relative to last year.

raise_rate_history¶

dict[int, Decimal] – Raises for all years on record.

spouse¶

Person – The person’s spouse. This linkage is one-to-one; the spouse’s spouse attribute points back to this Person.

tax_treatment¶

Tax – The tax treatment of the person. A callable object; see documentation for Tax for more information.

__gt__(other)[source]¶

Allows for sorting, max, min, etc. based on gross income.

age(date) → int[source]¶

The age of the Person as of date.

date may be a datetime object or a numeric value indicating a year (e.g. 2001). In the latter case, the age on the person’s birthday (in that year) is returned.

Parameters:

date – The date at which to determine the person’s age. May be passed as a datetime or any other value that can be cast to str and converted to datetime by python-dateutils.parse().
Returns:

The age of the Person as an int.
Raises:
  • ValueError – date is not parseable as a datetime.
  • ValueError – date is earlier than birth_date.
  • OverflowError – date is too large.
birth_date

The birth date of the Person.

contribution_room(account)[source]¶

The contribution room for the given account.

The account must provide a contribution_token attribute.

Returns:contribution_room} pairs for the account if it has been registered, or None if it is not registered.
Return type:A dict of {year
gross_income

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

gross_income_history

Record of gross_income over all past years.

name

The name of the Person.

net_income

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

net_income_history

Record of net_income over all past years.

raise_rate

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

raise_rate_function

A function that returns the Person’s raise for a given year.

Returns:A function with signature raise_rate(year) -> Decimal.
Return type:callable
raise_rate_history

Record of raise_rate over all past years.

register_shared_contribution(account)[source]¶

Prepares a Person to store contribution room for an account.

This method starts tracking contribution room for the account if it isn’t already and also keeps track of which accounts have shared contribution room.

retirement_age¶

The age of the Person at retirement

retirement_date

The retirement date of the Person.

spouse

The Person’s spouse.

tax_credit_history¶

Record of tax_credit over all past years.

tax_deduction_history¶

Record of tax_deduction over all past years.

tax_treatment

The tax treatment of the Person.

tax_withheld¶

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

tax_withheld_history¶

Record of tax_withheld over all past years.

taxable_income¶

Returns cached value in *_history dict if available.

taxable_income_history¶

Record of taxable_income over all past years.
